name: 近くの乗客
text: お、いいねえ\nえびしゅうまい弁当？
trans: Oh wow, that Prawn Shumai Bentou looks good.

name: 近くの乗客
text: やっぱり旅の定番を抑えとくべきかなと思いまして
trans:
I thought of getting something that could go up
against your standard station bentou but,

name: 近くの乗客
text: でも匂いを嗅ぐとそちらも羨ましくなりますね～
trans:
the smell from over there is making me envious
too!

name: 雛菜
text: この電車、車内販売ないの～？
trans: Aren't they selling anything on the train?

name: 小糸
text: あ、飴ならあるよ……！\nお腹は膨らまないけど……
trans:
Ah, but I do have some candies...!
They won't fill your stomach though...

name: 近くの乗客
text: ──あったかいお茶も買ってありますんで\nよかったら
trans:
──and I got some hot tea too,
if you'd like some.

name: 近くの乗客
text: お、気が利くねえ\nいくらだった？
trans:
Oh, good thinking.
How much was it?

name: 小糸
text: ……待ち合わせ時間、\nもうちょっと早くすれば良かったね……！
trans:
...If only we met up,
just a little earlier...!

name: 小糸
text: バスが渋滞しなかったら、\nお弁当も飲み物も買えたんだけど……
trans:
And if our bus wasn't stuck in the traffic jam,
we would have been able to buy bentous and drinks...

name: 雛菜
text: 小糸ちゃん、ちょっとどいて～？

name: 雛菜
text: みんなの分も買うよ～？\nいい～？
trans:
I'll buy for everyone too～?
Will that be okay～?

name: 小糸
text: ひ、雛菜ちゃん\nこの駅、多分そんなに長く止まらないから……！
trans:
H-Hinana-chan
I think this stop's very short, so...!

name: 小糸
text: あ……\nわ、わたしも手伝ってくる

name: 小糸
trans:
R-Right!
Hm, what about the bentou...?

name: 小糸
text: ま、円香ちゃん！\n起きてたの？

name: 円香
text: ……もう現地に着いてから食べたら\n仕事が始まるまで少しは時間あるでしょ
trans:
...Let's just grab something once we reach the area.
We have some time before the job right?

name: 円香
trans: Yea, it'll take my mind off the hunger too.

name: 円香
trans: Wake me up when we reach.

name: 透
trans: Koito-chan, how's the time looking like?

name: 小糸
text: う、うん\n時間は……あるけど……
trans:
Y-Yes.
We do have some time...but...
